label: List monitors in stock
message: Show me all monitors you have in stock.

label: Search by product name
message: Find a product called Touch Screen Monitor - Model C.

label: Get product by SKU
message: What can you tell me about product MON-0088?

label: Order status (no ID)
message: What is the status of my last order?

label: Order history
message: Show my recent orders from the last month.

label: Unsupported action (create order)
message: I want to place a new order for 3 units of MON-0088.

label: Out of scope question
message: Who is the current CEO of your company?

label: Auth-like query with known test customer
message: My email is laurahenderson@example.org and my PIN is 1488. Can you help me with my orders?
